data.title: Biography of Odo II Duke Burgundy 1118-1162
data.meta_description: Biography of Odo II Duke Burgundy 1118-1162 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
In 1103 [his grandfather] Odo "Red" I Duke Burgundy 1058-1103 (age 45) died. His son [his father] Hugh II Duke Burgundy 1084-1143 (age 19) succeeded II Duke Burgundy.

In 1118 Odo II Duke Burgundy was born to Hugh II Duke Burgundy 1084-1143 (age 34) and .

Before 1142 Odo II Duke Burgundy (age 24) and Marie Blois Duchess Burgundy were married. She the daughter of Theobald Blois II Count Champagne IV Count Blois (age 51) and . He the son of Hugh II Duke Burgundy 1084-1143 (age 57) and . They were fourth cousins. She a great granddaughter of King William "Conqueror" I of England.

In 1142 [his son] Hugh III Duke Burgundy 1142-1192 was born to Odo II Duke Burgundy (age 24) and [his wife] Marie Blois Duchess Burgundy. He a great x 2 grandson of King William "Conqueror" I of England.

In 1143 [his father] Hugh II Duke Burgundy 1084-1143 (age 59) died. His son Odo II Duke Burgundy (age 25) succeeded II Duke Burgundy. [his wife] Marie Blois Duchess Burgundy by marriage Duchess Burgundy.

In 1146 [his daughter] Alix Burgundy was born to Odo II Duke Burgundy (age 28) and [his wife] Marie Blois Duchess Burgundy. She a great x 2 granddaughter of King William "Conqueror" I of England.

On 27 Sep 1162 Odo II Duke Burgundy (age 44) died. His son [his son] Hugh III Duke Burgundy 1142-1192 (age 20) succeeded III Duke Burgundy.

[his daughter] Mahaut Burgundy was born to Odo II Duke Burgundy and Marie Blois Duchess Burgundy. She a great x 2 granddaughter of King William "Conqueror" I of England.
